#summary A Guide to using the "mock" framework for SSA4J
#labels Featured

Using an instance of [SSA4JAPI#MockScrapeSessionManager MockScrapeSessionManager] you can create XML files that contain "scenarios" of possible responses from screen-scraper.

== Example: Mocking the "Shopping Site" Session ==

Here is an example of how we would mock 3 possible responses from screen-scraper for the example outlined in the [SSA4JTutorial Shopping Site Tutorial].

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ssa4j:mocksession xmlns:ssa4j="http://schemas.mobuser.com/ssa4jmock" 
    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
    xsi:schemaLocation="http://ssa4j.googlecode.com/files/ssa4jmock-0.7.0.xsd" id="Shopping Site">
    <scenario>

        <test>
        <![CDATA[
        return session.page == 1;
        ]]>
        </test>
        
        <variables>
            <variable name="zenid">2DFS3423SEAAFE3487</variable>
        </variables>

        <dataset id="PRODUCTS">
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">A Bug's Life</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-ABUG</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Warner</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">A Bug's Life "Multi Pak"</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-ABUG</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Warner</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">Beloved</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-BELOVED</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Warner</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">Blade Runner - Director's Cut</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-BLDRNDC</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Warner</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">Courage Under Fire</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-CUFI</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Fox</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">Die Hard With A Vengeance</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-DHWV</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Fox</field>
            </datarecord>
        </dataset>

    </scenario>
    <scenario>

        <test>
        <![CDATA[
        return session.page == 2;
        ]]>
        </test>
        
        <variables>
            <variable name="zenid">2DFS3423SEAAFE3487</variable>
        </variables>

        <dataset id="PRODUCTS"> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">Fire Down Below</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-FDBL</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Warner</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">Frantic</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-FRAN</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Warner</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">Lethal Weapon</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-LTWP</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Warner</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">Red Corner</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-REDC</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Warner</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">Speed</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-SPEED</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Fox</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">Speed 2: Cruise Control</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-SPEED2</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Fox</field>
            </datarecord> 
        </dataset>

    </scenario>
        <scenario>

        <test>
        <![CDATA[
        return session.page == 3;
        ]]>
        </test>
        
        <variables>
            <variable name="zenid">2DFS3423SEAAFE3487</variable>
        </variables>

        <dataset id="PRODUCTS"> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">The Matrix</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-MATR</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Warner</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">The Replacement Killers</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-RPMK</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">23.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Microsoft</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">There's Something About Mary</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-TSAB</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Fox</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">Under Siege</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-UNSG</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Warner</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">Under Siege 2 - Dark Territory</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-UNSG2</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Warner</field>
            </datarecord> 
            <datarecord>
                <field name="TITLE">You've Got Mail</field>
                <field name="MODEL">DVD-YGEM</field>
                <field name="SHIPPING_WEIGHT">7.00</field>
                <field name="MANUFACTURED_BY">Warner</field>
            </datarecord>
        </dataset>

    </scenario>

</ssa4j:mocksession>
}}}
